note.p: Career: Jeweller to the Queen; ? Sheriff of London or Kent
Foster, Joseph, ed 'Grantees of Arms' (London: Harleian Society, 1915) Harleian Society, 6;
Ridge, Harold, ed 'Index to wills proved in the Prerogative Court of Canterbury. Vol. XI' (London: British Record Society, 1958) (Index Library, 77)
References: Foster, Joseph, (ed), 'Grantees of Arms' (London: Harleian Society, 1915) (Harleian Society, 66)
Ridge, Harold, ed 'Index to wills proved in the Prerogative Court of Canterbury. Vol. XI' (London: British Record Society, 1958) (Index Library, 77)

Notes: Never in PL; in 1664 accounts only. Bulloch gives date of death as 1703, says he was Sheriff of London in 1670, but this is not mentioned by Beavan or Woodhead. Will proved in 1691. Hunter calls him Sheriff of Kent. Election date as in JB; admitted 18 November 1663 [JB]
